page.title: 04Events Around Tenbury 2.
page.content: rooms and extra space in both Tenbury High School and Tenbury Primary School. A group of volunteers called the Ace of Clubs,are showing films at the weekends and the bank_ holidays.The Choral and the Dramatic societies use the Regal Cinema to perform in.Instead of paying rent to use the cinema,the various clubs hope to run it instead. At the Community Centre which is at the back of the Regal Cinema,repairs are being done to the windows and the door.New windows are being put in and a new door with a ramp to help wheelchairs to get up the step is being fitted.It will also help people who can't walk very well.
